name: Feline Sleepy
description:
Feline Sleepy is a whimsical text adventure set in rural England. The player takes the role of Jenny who's driving around the country on a touring holiday. A near miss with a deer sees Jenny pull over to calm her nerves and she falls asleep. When she awakes it's too late to continue as planned so she stops at the nearest hotel for the night. Behind the desk is a large cat in a porters uniform and from there things begin to get strange

This game was developed using Professional Adventure Writer. It supports the standard shortcuts such as N/S/E/W for North/South/East/West as well as more advanced commands. When completed correctly the player will have scored 100 points.
